{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Ambit_Microsystems_T60H570 |wikipedia = |brand = Ambit Microsystems |model = T60H570 |submodelappend = |submodel = .00 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MCLT60H570 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Atmel;AT76C506; |chip2 = RFMD;RF2948B; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna2 = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/20/2002 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== MiniPCI Type IIIb Card, '''Atmel/RFMD''' (802.11b NIC) + '''Agere''' Scorpio (modem) Likely PCI ID of [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1114/0506 1114:0506] (default AT76C506 ID) Per the FCC operational description (pretty much just a datasheet in this instance)...
'''Transmitter Output Power''' *Typically 16 dBm '''Receiver Sensitivity''' (@ 8% PER) *11Mbps: < -80 dBm *5.5Mbps: < -83 dBm *2Mbps: < -85 dBm *1Mbps < -87 dBm 00:08:02 ('''HP''') OUI shown in the FCC photos, likely indicating usage in some '''HP''' product Card is pre-'''Hon Hai''' acquisition, presumed to be made in '''Taiwan''' [[Category:English Documentation]]
